item.title: What's it like being a social media consultant [humour]
item.description: Social Media Marketing Consultant Time Management humour

item.title: Saturday Humour - Size of blogging [infographic]
item.description: Saturday’s usual weekly comic has been moved aside this week for something more important. So its a week to Xmas … and all through the house not a creature was stirring - except for creatives and marketing types publishing their great present gifts for the world to enjoy. What’s your opinion? do you think this Tree of Blogs sums things up quite nicely? and looking ahead - will the roots generate enough food and support for the future?

item.title: Saturday Funny - a guide to the internet
item.description: So how would you explain the internet to a 19th century Dickensian street urchin. Can you make it through the flowchart without being killed? Source: FastCompany

item.title: Happy Saturday Humour - What are you like when you pitch?
item.description: Hope you’re having a good weekend so far! How do you think people perceive your communication skills? and if you’re an entrepreneur — how good are you at pitching? source: www.gapingvoid.com

item.title: How smartphone users see each other
item.description: Happy Friday everyone … Now go look at yourself in the mirror? Source: http://androidandme.com/2010/11/news/how-smartphone-users-see-each-other-android-vs-blackberry-vs-iphone-comic/
